'''Fragrant Rice Pudding''' is a Quest Item obtained during the "[[Contraption-Contrived Cooking Course: Part II]]" Event [[World Quest]]. Three copies of this item will automatically be added into the player's [[inventory]] and will then be given to [[Cloud Retainer]].
